summary: Static website single home page for an electric products trader, focused on sensored electric products and including relevant product photos.

existing_features.title: Create a single, static, responsive home page for an electric products trading business focused on sensored electric products, using English for all visible text.

Design and implement a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for an industrial/electrical trading brand, applied consistently across the page (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette).
Add a product showcase section featuring sensored electric products, including a grid/list of product cards with an image, product name, and a short description per item.

Add a hero section with a clear headline and subheadline describing the business (electric products trader specializing in sensor-based electrical products), plus primary/secondary call-to-action buttons (e.g., “View Products”, “Request a Quote”).

Add supporting sections suitable for a static trading-business home page: an 'About' section, a 'Why Choose Us' / key advantages section, and a 'Contact' section with non-functional form fields (name, email, message) and visible placeholder contact details.
Add the generated sensored electric product images into the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the hero and product showcase sections.
Update all visible company/brand name text across the home page from “SensorTech Electric” to “Electric Light”.

Add the uploaded logo image (Gemini_Generated_Image_x7wtyjx7wtyjx7wt.png) to the frontend as a static asset and display it in the site branding area (next to the company name) in both the header and footer.
Update the HTML document title to reflect the new company name “Electric Light”.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a static website single home page for an electric products trader focused on sensored electric products
Include photos/images of sensored electric products on the home page
Change the company name/site branding text to “Electric Light”
Add and display the uploaded company logo on the home page (e.g., in the header/hero)

projectName: Static home page for sensored electric products trader
